code: import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import classes from'./CartItem.module.css';import{cartActions}from'../../store/cart-slice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartItem=props=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const{title,quantity,total,price,id}=props.item;const removeItemhandler=()=>{dispatch(cartActions.removeItemFromCart(id));};const addItemhandler=()=>{dispatch(cartActions.addItem({id,title,price}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:classes.item,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.price,children:["$",total.toFixed(2),' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:classes.itemprice,children:["($",price.toFixed(2),"/item)"]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.details,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.quantity,children:["x ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:quantity})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.actions,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:removeItemhandler,children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addItemhandler,children:"+"})]})]})]});};export default CartItem;
